item.title: GALA - Greedy ComputAtion for Linear Algebra in Privacy-Preserved Neural Networks
item.author: 作者
item.description: GALA: Greedy ComputAtion for Linear Algebra in Privacy-Preserved Neural Networks NDSS 2021 Qiao Zhang, Chunsheng Xin, and Hongyi Wu 系统描述 本文提出的GALA系统用于简化隐私保护神经网络模型中的线性计算(即矩阵-向量乘法和卷积)。基于
